body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: A strong aroma of coffee is filling the room. It seems to be coming from this guy and his weird contramption 

 [1]: "Hello" 
 [2]: "Hey, it does smell good here, huh?" 
 [3]: "Hello sir, do you, by any chance, have some spare coffee?" 
 [4]: "What is that weird thing?" 
[5] [Leave the person alone]
title: Start1

body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: "Oh, hello" 

[1] "could you give me some coffee?" 
[2] "Do we like, know each other?" 
[3] "oh, it's nothing, I'll leave you alone." [Leave]
title: Hey

body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: "Oh, yeah, i was grinding some coffee. it turned out really good, but i've used my last beans..." 

[1] "Hey, i kinda need some coffee, could you give me some, please?" 
[2] "Wait, you're making coffee with *beans*?" 
[3] "Yeah, that's cool. See ya " [Leave]
title: Smell

body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: "yeah, sure, i've still got some ground coffee, i'll be making it right now " 

[1]: [Jut wait a while (Forbearance | DC 10)]  
[2] [chat to pass the time (Eloquence | DC 10)] 
[3] "Yeah, that's cool. See ya " [Leave]
title: Coffee

body:
[Forbearance]: Waiting is boring. You are young, you should do something, ANYTHING. Not stop and do nothing. At least it's over (-1 Reason) 

[1]: [Finally rab the coffee and do something]
title: WaitFail

body:
[Forbearance]: Stopping for a little while is conforting. Seeing the contraptions of the coffee machine working also helps (+1 Reason) 

[1]: [Catch your coffee and leave]
title: WaitSuccess

body:
[Eloquence]: Talking is relaxing, no one said anything important, but who cares? (+1 Reason) 

[1]: [Say goodbye and ]
title: TalkSuccess

body:
[Eloquence]: What where you thinking what could you talk about? You don't even know who you are (-1 Reason) 

[1]: [Say goodbye and ]
title: TalkFail

body:
[Efrim, Coffee Grinder]: "Yeah, i've recently gotten this coffee grinder, now i make the best coffee in NewSun" 

[1] "Oh, cool, coud i try that?" 
[2] "Oh, does anybody else have those *coffee beans*?" 
[3] "Yeah, that's cool. See ya " [Leave]
title: Thing
